mutants.code:
def compute_e(max_iter=101):
    e_val = 2.0
    fact = 2
    for i in range(2, max_iter + 1):
        e_val += 1.0 / fact
        fact *= i + 1
    e_val = round(e_val, 6)
    return e_val
